game.name: Cupcake Maker
game.description:
Our beloved and most favourite princess Elsa loves to accept a new challenge. This time she has a desire of becoming a popular chef in the kitchen. Hope you would help to her to make her dream come true. All you need to do is just follow the cupcake recipe and take care of putting all the needful ingredients in the right order. You will be guided properly on how to prepare a delicious cupcake. Start attempting the decoration part once you see that the dough gets ready. Stay cool and confident while trying this popular free online cooking game for girls.

It is also your responsibility to select the proper color and perfect glaze for the cupcake. Going through the instructions properly will help to create this relishing delight in the shortest possible time. It requires to use your sharp memory and patience to achieve the mission of this brand new cooking game for girls and boys. Keep the sequence of the preparation of cupcake in your mind. Start this cool html5 game with mixing baking powder, oil, milk and egg. Mix up all the ingredients perfectly before putting the delicacy into the oven to be baked. 

You are also advised to design and decorate your own cupcake to give it a delicious look. Cupcake Maker is an awesome free online kitchen game that features lots of cream, decorations and toppings. Also use strawberry and cherry pieces to decorate your scrumptious cake. Play this best online cooking game with your friends and try this fabulous cake recipe at your home in real!
